subject: Re: You tube?
author: Steve Hultay
full_text:
Frank, most don't understand what we are doing and you need to 
lighten up before you give yourself a stroke.  Let them do what they 
want, some have a different approach than us.  There really is no 
right and wrong way to do anything, only different ideas from very 
different people.

-Steve H


--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Frank Sumption <franks-boxes@...> 
wrote:
>
> 
>  I think I'll start making a distinction between the typical 
paranormal investigator moron, and ITC. The paranormal twits seem to 
have no concept of what spirit acutally is, and how it's possible to 
communicate. I'm tired to arguing with the idiots. I can't get past 
their huge egos to make teh point that it's not white noise, and 
spirits can travel. I just had another go round with one of Rosemary 
Guiley's friends, her tech, these people just can't hear what I'm 
trying to say.
> 
>  
>  
>  Frank
>  
>  
> 
> 
> 
> To: EVP-ITC@...: urkel23@...: Fri, 9 Nov 2007 20:09:23 
+0000Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: You tube?
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Paranormal Experts??? Is there such a thing, are we talking about 
the field that has ideas and theories and no solid evidence of 
anything to back it up? It's like being an expert at something that 
you can't prove exists in the first place. We would have a better 
shot of being an expert at picking the winning lottery numbers than 
proving to someone that an afterlife exists.-Steve H.--- In EVP-
ITC@yahoogroups.com, Frank Sumption <franks-boxes@> wrote:>> > Yeah, 
he's got the grumpy attitude! I just wanted to get some audio and 
video out here so the average person could hear what it's supposed 
to sound like unfiltered by some paranormal expert. Unfrotunate that 
it'll probably create some demand. > > Frank> > > To: EVP-ITC@: 
urkel23@: Fri, 9 Nov 2007 19:41:44 +0000Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: You 
tube?> > > > > I can see it now ---- E-True hollywood story: Frank 
Sumption. I'd know i'd watch, maybe they can get russell crowe to 
play you in it.-Steve H.--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Frank 
Sumption <franks-boxes@> wrote:>> > I get grumpy, and pissed. I try 
to share to information about the box, and it's the same friggin' 
arguement everytime. I'm just now answering e-mails generated from 
the mistake of leaving a comment on a site about how I think most of 
what passes for paranormal knowledge is Hollywood. I can't get past 
that shit, nor can I get past the egos, so I give up, they can't 
hear me. > > I think the problem is intellect, it takes a certain 
level to be able to comprehend, and use the boxes, to everyone else 
its' going to look fake, and sound like gibberish. > > > Frank-S> > 
> > > To: EVP-ITC@: lisby@: Thu, 8 Nov 2007 20:29:08 -0500Subject: 
Re: [EVP-ITC] You tube?> > > > > You don't scare me. Never have. > > 
I'm tempted to add "nyanyanyanyanya." :)> > Ann> > > > On Nov 8, 
2007, at 1:53 PM, Frank Sumption wrote:> > > > > I don't don't know, 
I think I just scare everyone.> > > To: evp-itc@: 
paranormalinvestigating@: Thu, 8 Nov 2007 11:42:31 -0500Subject: RE: 
[EVP-ITC] You tube?> > > Frank, I'll check tou tube and let you 
know. and if your a poor teacher how come everyone listens to what 
you have to say ? bruce> > Bruce Halliday Paranormal Investigating 
Team > > > To: evp-itc@: franks-boxes@: Thu, 8 Nov 2007 08:51:46 -
0700Subject: [EVP-ITC] You tube?> > > Hi All; I tried to post a 
couple box video's on you tube last night, they should come up if 
you do a search on Ghost Box, Frank's box, ITC, EVP, or paranormal, 
or maybe "PurpleAlienGirl" (user name). It's my first attempt, so 
I'm not sure if it worked, and it's blocked here at work. BTW, I'm 
not sure if the Purple Princess stuff puts people off, that's who my 
guys say I am, and I accept that as an axiom. As if it matters, but 
that's an "other level" identity, and has little to do with physical 
conditions. Purple is a treacher, that's all, I just happen to be a 
very poor teacher. Frank> > Climb to the top of the charts! Play
